sense.def: Alternative Names xu lao feng 虛勞風 , depletion exhaustion wind. Pathological Condition of cough and expectoration of phlegm brought about by wind harm caused by wind in a state of exhaustion. Su wen 素問 10: 唾出若涕，惡風而振寒，此為勞風之 病 , “What is spat resembles snivel [from the nose. The patient] has an aversion to wind and shakes from cold. This is the disease of exhaustion-wind ”.
